keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: List of business keywords to search (e.g., 'Real Estate', 'Plumber', 'Lawyer')

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: List of locations to search (state abbreviations or cities, e.g., 'CA', 'New York, NY')

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone for the results (PST, EST, CST, MST)

maxPages.title: Max Pages per Search
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape per keyword/location combination (30 results per page)

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of pages to scrape in parallel (higher = faster but more resources)
